mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL=#{memberEmail} AND MEMBER_STATUS='N'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M JOIN GROOMING G ON M.MEMBER_NO = G.MEMBER_NO WHERE GROOMING_NO = #{groomingNo} AND MEMBER_STATUS='N'
mapper.update: MERGE INTO MEMBER_TAG M USING (SELECT TAG_NO FROM TAG WHERE TAG_NAME=#{tagName}) T ON (TRIM(M.TAG_NO)= T.TAG_NO) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (MEMBER_NO, TAG_NO) VALUES (#{memberNo}, T.TAG_NO)
